jaca.android.tools
Class AllSensorsManager

java.lang.Object
  cartago.Artifact
      jaca.android.dev.JaCaArtifact
          jaca.android.dev.SensorManagerArtifact
              jaca.android.tools.AllSensorsManager

public class AllSensorsManager
extends SensorManagerArtifact

Artifact for managing the three most common Android sensors in a whole: accelerometer sensor, geomagnetic sensor, orientation sensor

Author:
asanti

#### Observable Properties #####

  • sensor_accelerometer(X,Y,Z). X,Y,Z = double values containing the current acceleration force for the X,Y,Z axis
  • sensor_geomag(X,Y,Z). Z,Y,Z = double values containing the current geomagnetic force for the X,Y,Z axis
  • sensor_orientation(Azimuth,Pitch,Roll).
    • Azimuth = double value containing the current azimuth value. Range [0,360[ (360 excluded)
    • Pitch = double value containing the current pitch value. Range [-180,180]
    • Roll = double value containing the current roll value. Range [-90,90]
    Azimuth
